article_title: Once helping those with breast and cervical cancer, Ky. Pink Connection expands
article_text: Kentucky Pink Connection is expanding beyond providing services for breast and cervical cancer patients to help people with all forms of cancer, and is changing its name to Kentucky CancerLink. "This is the time to take that leap of faith," said Executive Director Vicki Blevins.

article_summary:
Kentucky Pink Connection is expanding beyond providing services for breast and cervical cancer patients to help people with all forms of cancer, and is changing its name to Kentucky CancerLink.
"This is the time to take that leap of faith," said Executive Director Vicki Blevins.
